descriptors.text: A distant scream echoes through the corridors, then falls silent
Something heavy falls with a crash somewhere nearby
You could swear you hear whispering, but there's no one there
Footsteps echo from somewhere you can't quite place
A grinding sound of stone on stone reverberates through the walls
A metallic clang rings out in the distance
A single drop of water falls, its echo multiplying into a chorus
Loose stones clatter down from somewhere in the darkness above
A bat's screech pierces the silence, then fluttering wings fade into the distance
A deep rumble vibrates through the stone - the mountain settling, perhaps
Wind moans through unseen passages, carrying with it the smell of deep places
Chains rattle somewhere in the darkness
A door creaks open or closed in a distant corridor
Water drips with maddening regularity from the ceiling
Something scratches at the other side of a nearby wall
A muffled cry reaches you from deep within the dungeon
A branch snaps somewhere in the undergrowth
A bird calls out, its song echoing through the trees
Leaves rustle overhead as something moves through the canopy
An owl hoots mournfully in the distance
An animal cries out - hunter or hunted, you cannot tell
Shadows shift at the corner of your vision, but nothing's there when you look
The light flickers and dims for a moment before returning to normal
Dust drifts down from above, glittering in the dim light
A faint glow pulses briefly from somewhere you can't quite identify
You glimpse movement in the distance, but it's gone before you can focus
A bubble of lava surfaces and pops, sending sparks into the air
A jet of steam hisses from a crack in the rock
Glowing embers drift lazily through the superheated air
Cracks in the stone briefly glow brighter as magma surges below
Fine volcanic ash drifts down like gray snow
A ghostly light flickers in a distant window before fading
A piece of stonework crumbles and falls from above
You glimpse a reflection in a dusty surface that doesn't match your position
Ancient inscriptions briefly glow as you pass
A shadow passes across a doorway - but there's no one there
Rats scatter as you approach, disappearing into cracks in the walls
You brush through an invisible spider web - something small scurries away
A bat flutters past your head, startling you momentarily
An insect buzzes past your ear with an angry drone
Tiny eyes reflect your light from the darkness, then blink out
A colony of bats erupts from a crevice, filling the air with leathery wings
Pale, blind fish scatter in a underground pool as your shadow passes
A large cave spider retreats into its web as you approach
Glow worms on the ceiling create a false starfield above you
A large centipede skitters across the stone floor
A large frog leaps from a log and splashes into the murky water
A snake slithers away through the undergrowth as you approach
A cloud of biting insects descends upon you briefly before dispersing
A bird screeches an alarm call before taking flight
Something large moves beneath the water's surface, creating ripples
A deer freezes at your approach, then bounds away through the trees
A squirrel chatters angrily at you from a high branch
A flock of birds takes flight, disturbed by your presence
A rabbit dashes across your path and disappears into the brush
A fox watches you from the undergrowth before slinking away
Ancient dust settles around you, disturbed by your passage
A cold draft washes over you from an unseen source
A stone cracks underfoot, louder than expected
A pocket of stale, musty air assaults your senses
The floor creaks ominously beneath your weight
Ice cracks somewhere nearby with a sound like breaking glass
Frost crystallizes before your eyes on a nearby surface
Your breath fogs heavily in the frigid air
An icicle breaks free and shatters on the frozen ground
A freezing wind howls through the passage, cutting to the bone
The ground trembles briefly beneath your feet
A burst of sulfurous gas escapes from a crack in the rock
A wave of intense heat washes over you from deeper within
Superheated rock pops and cracks around you
Volcanic ash swirls in the heated air currents
Bubbles rise from the murky water, releasing foul-smelling gas
The mud squelches loudly with each step
A bank of mist rolls in, obscuring your vision
A waterlogged branch falls from a dead tree with a splash
A faint light flickers over the marsh - swamp gas, perhaps
